TopicTitle: The Number War: Count to 100 or -100

-42

I don't know why I got bored of this game. Guess winning made me feel accomplished enough not to feel the need to win anymore.

Well, I'm somewhat bored because a large number of people quit.

This game really is only fun with tons of people doing wacked out things to get a lead...

If only us GM's could play...

But I have to sit here at the window and watch you guys play.

Have fun for me!

Honestly, I think GM's should be allowed to play, but MUST choose and honour one particular side. A GM may not use GM powers to influence a gain for their side (hence actions that would benefit one side would require a GM of the opposite side); of course Deu is actually Team Revert so that might not work out well ;p

Honestly, I think GM's should be allowed to play, but MUST choose and honour one particular side. A GM may not use GM powers to influence a gain for their side (hence actions that would benefit one side would require a GM of the opposite side); of course Deu is actually Team Revert so that might not work out well ;p

Plus, if a positive GM can't rule something because it might benefit positives, then the negative GM can't rule it either cause they could hurt the positives.
